Sometimes the very simplest of applications, that works very well and only does the one thing very well, is like a nice hot fire in an endless snow storm of options, settings, selections, functions and bottomless drll down menus. I am pleased that you can save your files in only one of two formats e.g. mp3, and save them in the phones memory or on a card. And it is either recording, or playing back. This is good. It is even better that it is a small file and it works on OLD out dated cheap phones, that have real performance issues in processing and memory space. You can turn them into desk top dictation / narration for video machines. On the modern daily drive, it's so simple to set up and it's SO refreshing when you ONLY want to do the ONE simple thing, which is just make decent audio recordings.

This app will provide you with a feature rich interface, high quality recordings with bare minimal requested permissions. You really can't go wrong with any of the apps in this developers lineup, nothing but the best here. Highly recommend, check em out.

Beautiful app. I tried 7 apps before this. This app does exactly what it says. Simple voice recorder means voice recorder. I love this app. They ask permission only to use microphone as it is a required access. If you love privacy, this app is for you. Other apps asked permission for photos, videos, messages, wifi and phone calls. They were only stealing personal data.

The app isn't suitable for me because it can only record to MP3, not to WAV or FLAC. I never want to risk any singing or piano playing I record being unintelligible due to lossy encoding. Apart from that, the UI is simple and easy to use. The waveform while recording gives confidence it's working. One flaw: it's confusing that the record view shows the previous recording's waveform and timestamp prominently, not grayed out. It makes it look like pressing Record will resume recording from there.

Good

Seems very simple and useful. Many voice recorders make it flashy with sound bars/graph look. If you could make a large button instead of sound bars. For us busy people...we just want to push a large button and go...on and off. My brain take an extra "milisecond" to see the small button at bottom. But maybe you'll have more downloads with "Flash" look. 3 Stars for now because I will nor use with small button. 5 stars later if you change. Great app though. Thank you

A nice and simple voice recording app. Clean UI, no special permissions required. However, after upgrading to an Android 10 phone from Android 6, there is a slight difference in functionality. The app no longer has an option to "save recordings in". I used this option on Android 6 to save my recordings to the SD card. In Android 10, this app only stores voice recordings to the Music folder on internal storage, without any way to change it. When I copied my older recordings (made on Android 6) from the SD card to the internal Music folder, the app does not see them. On Android 10, the recordings list within the app only lists the recordings made by the app since it was installed on Android 10. I am running the same version of Simple Voice Recorder (5.1.3) on both Android 10 and 6.
perfect, my only recommendation is to add a widget

Clean UI. Offline w/ few Permissions. No ads. Records adequately. Has true SD card suppport. I do wish it supported Bluetooth. I also wish for a Pause/Resume function & Play controls in the Notification. Its date format options won't apply. Still, this voice recorder app is better than most, it just needs to mature a bit, IMO.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hey, many improvements are on the roadmap, stay tuned. Thanks

google_play_reviews.content: Seems to be an excellent app in typical SMT style: fast UI, to the point, truly simple. Not giving 5 stars for only being able to record to mp3, where I would expect more modern codecs like opus, perhaps ogg vorbis, and a lossless one like flac for when every bit of quality matters.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Not photos, but to storage to save the recordings... On Android 10 not even that is needed.
